seo.title: Manarola Boat Tours 2025 | Cinque Terre Cruises & Excursions
seo.description: Best boat tours from Manarola. See all five villages from the sea, sunset cruises, and swimming stops.

body.title: Boat Tours & Excursions
body.subtitle: Experience Cinque Terre from the sea. See the colorful villages from the water, swim in hidden coves, and enjoy sunset cruises.

features.title: Five Villages Tour
features.description: Full-day boat tour visiting all five villages. Swimming stops and onboard lunch.

features.title: Sunset Cruise
features.description: Evening tour along the coast. Watch sunset with prosecco and local snacks.

features.title: Swimming Excursion
features.description: Half-day tour to hidden coves. Snorkeling equipment and refreshments included.

features.title: Photography Cruise
features.description: Morning departure for best light. Capture all villages from perfect angles.

features.title: Wine Tasting Cruise
features.description: Combine boat tour with vineyard visits. Sample local wines at sea-view cantinas.

features.title: Private Charters
features.description: Rent your own boat with captain. Customize your route and schedule.
